articles.title: Jaywing extends BizCover partnership and adds Lyka
articles.author: Mediaweek
articles.summary: Jaywing has extended its partnership with BizCover, focusing on Digital PR and SEO to drive organic growth. BizCover experienced increased media exposure and supported organic growth objectives due to the strategic approach of Jaywing. Furthermore, Lyka has engaged Jaywing to explore organic growth opportunities through SEO and assess the impact of generative AI.

articles.title: Amazon Australia slashes the price of top-selling hair dryer to just $79: ‘The deal of the century'
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Amazon Australia has significantly reduced the price of the Dreame Hair Gleam Hair Dryer to $79. The hairdryer is praised for its fast-drying technology, lightweight design, multiple temperature settings, and hair-smoothing negative ions. Customers are comparing it favorably to Dyson hair dryers, citing its lighter weight, quieter operation, and higher wind speed.

articles.title: Z.ai Launches GLM Coding Plan, Making Top-Tier AI Development Accessible to All
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Z.ai launched a groundbreaking new product. This launch follows the widespread adoption of its core model, GLM-4.5.

articles.title: AB Tasty Announces One Platform, Changing How Marketing and Product Teams Optimize Customer Journeys  Sep. 23, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: AB Tasty launched "One Platform," a unified platform for client-side and server-side experimentation. The platform combines Feature Experimentation and Rollouts with a no-code experimentation suite, enabling digital teams to personalize customer journeys with safety and speed. It aims to help teams test, validate, and roll out digital experiences at scale, improving consistency across channels and devices.

articles.title: Free Welcome Bonus No Deposit Required Real Money Casino In 2025 By Cafe Casino
articles.summary: Cafe Casino and other online casinos are using "free welcome bonus no deposit required real money" offers to attract new users. These bonuses are evolving to focus on transparency and speed of payouts as key factors for player trust and are becoming a standard for new player engagement. The US online gaming market is seeing increased player expectations and regulatory scrutiny of these offers.

articles.title: Magnum ice cream company to use NotCo AI for new products
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Magnum, a Unilever ice cream brand, intends to leverage NotCo's AI to reformulate existing products and develop novel ice cream creations. This initiative is planned in anticipation of Magnum's public listing in November.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Café Signature Hits Costco, Promising Café Drinks Without the Café Line
articles.author: Jim Hoffman
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Luxe Café Signature Series, a 3-in-1 coffee machine brewing espresso, drip coffee, and cold brew, exclusively at Costco for $529.99. This machine offers cafe-quality results at home, with a quick-brew cold brew method and a high-pressure extraction system for espresso. Costco's exclusive partnership makes this machine attractive to those looking to reduce their yearly cafe bill.

articles.title: 10 early October Prime Day deals on hair styling tools by Dyson, Hot Tools, CHI
articles.author: Jessica Moore
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Big Deal Days in October, offering discounts on various hair styling tools. Brands like Dyson, Revlon, Shark, and CHI are featured, with deals up to 50% off on items like hair dryers, flat irons, and curling irons. The sale includes new or updated products featuring advanced technologies, such as Dyson's lightest hair dryer and Shark's HyperAIR IQ Technology.

articles.title: This No. 1 bestselling Shark Robot Vacuum is 53% off on Amazon before Prime Day
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Shark is offering its AI Robot Vacuum with XL HEPA Self-Empty Base at a 54% discount on Amazon. The vacuum features AI navigation and an XL HEPA Self-Empty Base. Amazon is also offering early deals in advance of its Prime Big Deal Days event.

articles.title: Wavytalk's High-Powered Hair Dryer Is 31% off Right Now
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Wavytalk offers the Wavytalk Hair Dryer, featuring three attachments, a powerful 1875-watt motor, and ionic technology. This hair dryer is praised for quickly drying and straightening hair, reducing frizz, and being lightweight. It currently has a 31% discount on Amazon.

articles.title: Day 2: Ganesh Consumer IPO receives 41 pc subscription
articles.summary: Ganesh Consumer Products Ltd, a packaged food company, launched its IPO. It intends to utilize Rs 45 crore from the fresh issuance for setting up a roasted gram flour and gram flour manufacturing unit in Darjeeling.

articles.title: Eye Mo unveils a fresh new look
articles.author: MBrand
articles.summary: Eye Mo, produced by PT Combiphar, has unveiled refreshed packaging featuring a modern, nature-inspired design while maintaining its original formula. The new packaging aims to unify the brand's identity across international markets and reflects Eye Mo's evolution.

articles.title: The Vision Behind the Screens: Samsung enriches entertainment and lifestyle with vision AI
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced its new Vision AI TVs, featuring advanced AI processors like the NQ8 AI Gen 3, enhancing entertainment and smart home management capabilities. The lineup includes Neo QLED 8K, QLED 4K, and Crystal UHD 4K models. The Great Samsung TV Sale, running until September 30, 2025, offers discounts and free soundbars on select models.

articles.title: Home Bargains is selling a Dyson dupe for just £13 – it will give you ‘salon-worthy hair'
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering the James London Ionic Hot Air Brush for £12.99, positioning it as an affordable alternative to the Dyson Airwrap. The 1200W hot air brush features three-speed settings and aims to provide salon-worthy results at home by combining a hairdryer and brush function for smoothing and volumizing hair.

articles.title: Is a top load washer right for you? Expert tips to keep in mind
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced the WT8600CW 5.5 cu. ft. Mega Capacity Top Load Washer with TurboWash™ Washer featuring Steam, ezDispense ®, and Wi-Fi Connectivity. This top-load washer incorporates TurboWash3D™ technology for efficient cleaning and offers user-friendly features like EasyUnload™, ezDispense®, and LG ThinQ ® technology for remote control and monitoring.

articles.title: DJI's Osmo Nano Is A Detachable Tiny Action Camera, Just Like Insta360's Go Ultra
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DJI launched the Osmo Nano, a new product aimed at competing in the market previously dominated by Insta360. This launch signifies DJI's expansion into a new product category.

articles.title: Action Bronson Partners With Puffco as Official Ambassador to Champion the Launch of the New Proxy
articles.author: Puffco
articles.summary: Puffco introduces the new Proxy vaporizer, an evolution of its modular vaporizer, with Action Bronson as its brand ambassador. The Proxy features new Onyx and Haze colorways, an upgraded 3D Chamber, a longer-lasting battery, and app-enabled precision through the Puffco Connect App for customizable temperature, session length, vapor density, and LED mood lighting.

articles.title: The Year-Round Sunscreen Every Black Woman Needs
articles.author: Brianna J. Heath
articles.summary: Hyper Skin launched their new sunscreen, Hyper Daily Invisible for All SPF 50 Sun Drops, at a Cafe Hyper launch event last October. The sunscreen features a fluid-like, serum texture that melts into the skin, providing hydration and protection without leaving a white cast or causing irritation. The product also contains a patented brightening ingredient to diminish hyperpigmentation.

articles.title: Feast on Good Fortune: Denny's Serves Up Movie-Inspired Eats, Late-Night Deals and Exclusive Merch
articles.author: Denny's
articles.summary: Denny's is launching two limited-time menu items inspired by the movie Good Fortune: the Good Fortune Burger and Budget Angel Chicken Nuggies. These items will be available exclusively on Dennys.com for takeout and delivery from September 24 through October 28. The Good Fortune Burger will also be 50% off from 4 p.m. to 4 a.m. on Dennys.com.

articles.title: GoPro Unveils MAX2 360-8K Camera and Introduces Lit Hero Camera: A New Era in Action Videography
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: GoPro has launched the MAX2, a 360-degree action camera featuring 8K resolution and improved stabilization. GoPro also introduces the Lit Hero, a camera designed for creators, focusing on integrated lighting solutions and innovative mounting options.

articles.title: TikTokers say this £4 lip balm could pass for a high-end favourite that costs £2
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Trouble Maker has launched the Peculiar Peptide Lip Balm, a £4 product exclusive to Superdrug. This balm is enriched with ingredients like vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, and jojoba oil, and is available in six flavors. It's marketed as a hydrating alternative to pricier options like Summer Fridays' lip balms and has gained popularity on social media.

articles.title: Sacramento laundromat uses robot folders
articles.summary: Monster Laundry in Sacramento unveiled new technology. The new tech could transform laundromats nationwide.

articles.title: Innovation Beverage Group Announces Reverse Stock Split
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Innovation Beverage Group Ltd (IBG), an innovative developer, is based in Sydney.

articles.title: Talkdesk Commercial & Residential Services Experience Cloud automates personalized, ...
articles.author: Talkdesk
articles.summary: Talkdesk, Inc. introduced Talkdesk Commercial & Residential Services Experience Cloud ™, a customer experience automation platform created for service-based businesses. This platform aims to address challenges related to managing time-sensitive customer interactions within sectors like home services, property management, and logistics.

articles.title: PTT Oil and Retail Business Unlocks Growth With AI-Driven Personalization Strategy  Sep. 23, 2025 13:45
org: PTT Oil and Retail Business Public Company Limited
articles.summary: PTT Oil and Retail Business Public Company Limited (OR) is advancing its digital transformation by focusing on personalization and intelligent customer engagement. This includes the relaunch of the blueplus+ app, which gained 3 million video views within three days by introducing new brand mascots and a virtual banking partnership with AIS and Krung Thai Bank.

articles.title: Jasper Introduces MCP Server to Power AI Content Workflows with Built-in Marketing Context and Governance
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: Jasper has launched its MCP Server, an open standard that helps organizations scale and govern AI-generated content across the enterprise. The MCP Server embeds brand guardrails and institutional knowledge into every AI input, ensuring consistent, high-quality outputs across various AI tools. This new product aims to provide centralized control with decentralized flexibility, allowing teams to generate brand-safe content while maintaining IT control.

articles.title: Santander launches new current account with £20 a month cashback after axing popular deal
articles.author: Senior Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Santander has launched the Santander Edge Explorer current account, offering customers £20 a month in cashback and various perks like worldwide family travel and mobile phone insurance, in exchange for a £17 monthly fee. The account also provides access to Santander's Edge Saver account with a 6.00% AER interest rate on balances up to £4,000.

articles.title: Singapore's first hybrid outdoor blind puts control back in homeowners' hands  Sep. 23, 2025 13:21
articles.summary: ZipBlind®, a leading Singaporean brand, has launched ZipBlind® X, the country's first 2-in-1 hybrid outdoor blind. This new product combines push-button controls with a spring-assisted hand pull, offering both motorized and manual operation. It is designed to provide convenience, speed, and safety for homeowners, while also maintaining durability and weather protection.

articles.title: AB Tasty Announces One Platform, Changing How Marketing and Product Teams Optimize Customer Journeys
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: AB Tasty has launched "One Platform", a unified platform for client-side and server-side experimentation. This platform enables digital teams to personalize customer journeys with safety, speed, and confidence. It combines AB Tasty's Feature Experimentation and Rollouts function with their no-code experimentation suite.

articles.title: VAPORESSO's Decade of Innovation: Elevating Vaping Aesthetics with the XROS 5 Series Special Edition
articles.author: VAPORESSO
articles.summary: VAPORESSO, celebrating its 10th anniversary, has launched special editions of its XROS 5 and XROS 5 MINI, expanding the legacy of the XROS series. These releases emphasize the company's focus on merging engineering with aesthetic design.

articles.title: Silka introduces Shea butter and Avocado Oil lotion
articles.author: MBrand
articles.summary: Silka has launched a new skin care lotion with Avocado Oil and Shea Butter. The lotion aims to hydrate, revitalize, and enhance skin texture, combining natural components with skin-friendly actives. It is available in major retail outlets nationwide and online.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE unveiled with huge freebie giveaway to rival iPhone 17
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a budget-friendly smartphone in its 'Fan Edition' series, starting at £649. It features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide and 50MP wide cameras, 256GB storage, a 4,900 mAh battery, and Galaxy AI capabilities. Some retailers offer deals including a free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 with purchase.

articles.title: Prophet Launches The AI Accelerator Network Partnering with leading AI companies
articles.author: Prophet
articles.summary: Prophet, a global growth and creative firm, launched its AI Accelerator Network. This network includes AI technology partners to help clients adopt and accelerate AI solutions for growth challenges.

articles.title: Amazon dehumidifier slashed to £43 is 'sleek' and 'great for drying clothes in winter'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Finade Dehumidifier for Home for £42.99, reduced from £69.99. This dehumidifier is designed for drying clothes and preventing mold, suitable for rooms of 15-20 square meters, and features a 1.3L capacity water tank with automatic shut-off.

articles.title: GPT Group brings Yango Yasmina AI speakers to Oman
articles.author: Times News Service
articles.summary: GPT Group, a leading technology distribution company in Oman, has become the official distributor of Yango Yasmina AI speakers. These speakers, powered by the Yasmina AI assistant, offer localized features, educational content, and entertainment. The Yasmina AI speakers are available in multiple models (Mini, Midi, and Lite) with different features, with prices ranging from OMR 21.9 to OMR 49.9.

articles.title: Wawa sets debut for refreshed store format in New Jersey
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Wawa is launching a redesigned store format in Pennsville, New Jersey, on September 25th. The new store features larger food displays, digital menus, a refreshed exterior, mobile ordering, curbside pickup, and delivery services. Additionally, opening day events include giveaways and free coffee to promote the new store and its offerings.

articles.title: Majority of Canadians Using AI Without Proper Training, New Data Finds
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Growclass has launched a new AI Marketing and Strategy Certification, a six-week program aimed at equipping marketing professionals with the skills to integrate AI into their work. The program includes hands-on experience with AI tools and a 30/60/90 day roadmap for integration, alongside live workshops and access to course materials.

articles.title: Santander launches new current account offering up to £20 cashback every month
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Santander has launched the Santander Edge Explorer current account. The new account offers up to £20 cashback monthly, along with worldwide family travel and mobile phone insurance.

articles.title: Litter Genie® Launches New Canadian‑Made Cat Litter, Solidifying its Position as a Complete Waste Management Solution for Cat Owners
articles.author: Litter Genie
articles.summary: Litter Genie launched Litter Genie Light, a Canadian-made clumping clay cat litter. This new product provides odour control and reliable clumping power at an affordable price.

articles.title: Amazon slashed 45% off Shark, Black+Decker and Dyson ahead of Prime Big Deal Days
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Dyson's Ball Animal Total Clean features self-adjusting cleaner head and HEPA filtration. Shark offers the PowerPro Reveal Plus Cordless Vacuum with powerful suction. Black+Decker's handheld vacuum has a 16V MAX lithium-ion battery for strong suction. A robot vacuum now offers automatic mop washing, self-emptying, and hot air drying.

articles.title: Primark's new £15 'croissant' pyjamas 'perfect' for 'lazy mornings'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new pyjama set featuring a baby blue design with coffee and croissant patterns priced at £15, described as offering a "cheeky twist" on traditional nightwear. They also released £18 Chunky Chelsea Boots and a £12 lounge set. Additionally, Primark has introduced new pyjama ranges inspired by The Sims and Animal Crossing.

articles.title: PNY expands India reach with creative Newtech deal
articles.summary: PNY Technologies has partnered with Creative Newtech Limited to distribute PNY's SSDs and DRAM in India. This alliance aims to expand market reach and provide reliable, fast memory solutions to gamers, creators, and enterprises leveraging Creative Newtech's distribution network.

articles.title: Santander UK launches current account offering up to �20 cashback per month
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Santander introduces the Santander Edge Explorer account, a service that provides a package of perks for a monthly fee of £17.

articles.title: Extra large heated airer 'for big family laundry loads' now £23
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering an extra-large heated airer for £23, originally priced at £50. The airer features optional timers, is made from durable aluminum, and folds for easy storage. Lakeland has reduced the price of its dry:soon deluxe 3-tier heated clothes airer to £169.99, originally priced at £199.99. Dunelm is selling a three-tier heated airer for £95.

articles.title: This sell-out advent calendar has £935 worth of beauty products for £99
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Avant has launched its Wonders Advent Calendar 2025, featuring 12 skincare products including a full-size version of the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream. The calendar, valued at £935 if products are bought separately, is selling for £99 and is available for a limited time on the Avant website. Select orders contain Golden Tickets for a chance to win £1,000 worth of Avant skincare.

articles.title: Al Abbadi Fragrances Launches in India on September 24, 2025, Promising Exclusivity and Rewards Like Never Before
articles.summary: Al Abbadi Fragrances is launching in India on September 24, 2025, introducing a new luxury perfume house with limited-edition, artisan-crafted perfumes sold through a unique drop-sale model. Each purchase unlocks exclusive rewards, redefining the relationship between customer and luxury label.

articles.title: $37M Costco breaks ground in booming Texas Hill Country town
articles.author: my SA
articles.summary: Costco is launching a new store in New Braunfels.

articles.title: Allstate Northern Ireland launches North West Digital Hub and Future Innovators Competition
articles.author: Gavin Walker
org: The Police Service of Northern Ireland
articles.summary: Allstate Northern Ireland is launching its North West Digital Hub and the 'Allstate Future Innovators' competition. This competition provides students with digital skills development and resources, challenging them to create apps related to safe driving. The initiative, supported by a grant from The Allstate Foundation, aims to inspire digital leaders and contribute to community road safety.

articles.title: From Kanpur Soaps To Billion-Dollar Empire: Meet Murli Dhar Gyanchandani, The Mind Behind Iconic Ghadi Detergent
articles.author: Edited by:
articles.summary: RSPL Group launched Leayan Global Private Limited in 1995, introducing the Red Chief footwear line. This diversification expanded the group's revenue streams.

articles.title: 31 Products So Useful You're Going To Want To Call Your Mom Just To Tell Her About Them
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced. These include Solar Buddies, a refillable sunscreen applicator, Shark's Steam & Scrub mop for floor cleaning, a flat-laying toiletry bag for organized packing, and a Febreze Unstopables car freshener for odor neutralization. Also introduced are the Renpho percussion massager with similar features to TheraGun, Revlon Volcanic Face Roller for soaking up the excess oil, the Pink Stuff for cleaning multiple surfaces, and I Dew Care dry shampoo powder.

articles.title: Myprotein discount codes – how to get 15% off in September 2025
articles.author: Harry Bullmore
articles.summary: Myprotein offers a 15% discount for new customers signing up for their newsletter, along with exclusive codes, early access to sales, and new product drops. The Myprotein app provides a smoother shopping experience, exclusive deals and early sales access. They have student discounts up to 60% and also provide referral programmes which rewards customers with a £15 voucher.

articles.title: Pudu Robotics Launches Self-Cleaning Docking Station for PUDU CC1 Series - Redefining Hands-Free Cleaning
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Pudu Robotics launched the Self-Cleaning Docking Station, an addition to the PUDU CC1 Series, enabling automated cleaning cycles and reducing upkeep. This docking station expands Pudu's cleaning solutions portfolio, providing a complete set of tools for consistent, unattended cleaning. The Self-Cleaning Docking Station will debut at CMS Berlin 2025.

articles.title: Nothing is safe from AI, not even your ice cream.
articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.summary: Magnum is using NotCo's AI, Giuseppe, to develop new ice cream products and revamp existing ones. NotCo has previously assisted brands like Shake Shack and Kraft in creating plant-based versions of various food products.

articles.title: Oppo F31 Pro+ smartphone review: Durable design, big battery and a worthy display
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the F31 Pro+, a new smartphone priced at Rs 32,999. The phone features an Armour Body, multiple ingress protection ratings, Dragontrail glass, a 6.8-inch display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, a 50MP main camera, and a 7,000mAh battery with 80-watt Super charging.

articles.title: Nissan hit with lawsuit over possibly illegal robocalls: 'They're a nuisance'
articles.author: Evan Mealins
articles.summary: Nissan is promoting the new Nissan Frontier and encourages interested customers to call back for questions or to set up a test drive.

articles.title: 24 Splurge-Worthy Beauty Products Reviewers Swear By
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Olaplex offers a repairing treatment designed to strengthen hair. Laneige provides a lip mask formulated with vitamin C and other ingredients for lip nourishment and protection. Supergoop! features a glow-enhancing SPF 40 sunscreen that also acts as a primer and BB cream. EltaMD offers an SPF 46 face sunscreen suitable for sensitive and acne-prone skin.

articles.title: Genisoft Web Launches FexaAI, an All-in-One AI Suite
articles.summary: Genisoft Web launched FexaAI on September 23, 2025, a unified platform designed for marketing, product, and engineering teams. FexaAI combines text, image, and code generation into one workspace, aiming to streamline content creation. The platform is now available for new users to explore its generators and create templates.

articles.title: 27 Time-Saving Products For People Who Hate Cleaning
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article introduces several new cleaning products designed to simplify household chores. These include stain removers, air purifiers, sink cleaners, toilet wands, vacuum cleaners, dish soaps, carpet cleaners, furniture protectors, and various specialized cleaning solutions for different surfaces and appliances. The products aim to reduce scrubbing effort, remove stubborn stains, and improve overall cleanliness with minimal effort.

articles.title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale is live: Save big on top load washing machines from LG, Samsung and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: During the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale, several companies, including LG, Samsung, Voltas Beko, IFB, and Thomson, are launching or offering deals on their top-load washing machines. These models feature advanced technologies such as Smart Inverter, Ecobubble, PureStream Pulsator, Deep Clean with AI, and Aqua Restore, with various capacities and features catering to different consumer needs and promising efficient and effective laundry solutions.

articles.title: Motorola Launches Cutting-Edge Moto Pad 60 NEO in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto pad 60 NEO in India during the Flipkart Big Billion Days 2025. The device features an 11" 2.5K display with a 90Hz refresh rate, MediaTek's Dimensity 6300 processor, Smart Connect technology, and a moto pen. It is available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores, starting at INR 12,999.

articles.title: NutriBullet dupe slashed from £70 to £19.99 in end-of-summer sale & it's perfect for making soups in the cold weather
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Debenhams has reduced the price of the Dyzi Portable Blender from £70.99 to £19.99. The blender has dual cups for juicing fruits and vegetables. Drew&Cole offers the 5-minute CleverChef which can sear steaks and make omelettes quickly.

articles.title: ZAPTEST.AI Now Available in Microsoft Azure Marketplace
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: ZAPTEST.AI is now available in the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. This provides ZAPTEST customers access to the Azure cloud platform with streamlined deployment and management.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner gives nod to Timothee Chalamet with latest move
articles.author: The News International
articles.summary: Kylie Jenner's Kylie Cosmetics has launched a new line of dessert-inspired body sprays. The launch was announced on Instagram.

articles.title: Unlock Seamless Digital Experiences with Yellow Slice -- Where Creativity Meets Strategy
articles.summary: Yellow Slice, a UI/UX design agency, offers an end-to-end suite of services designed to enhance user interactions across platforms. Their Corporate Innovation Lab helps organizations transform breakthrough ideas into actionable digital solutions. They follow a proprietary STEP framework -- Soak, Think, Execute, Proof -- ensuring that design quality is never compromised.

articles.title: Better Fintech Stock: Nu Holdings vs. SoFi Technologies
articles.author: Jennifer Saibil
articles.summary: SoFi is launching new features that appeal to its digital-savvy clientele, such as access to private equity funds through its investing products, and cryptocurrency trading. Nu is launching new products and services to attract higher-income customers and increase engagement in Brazil. These companies strategically introduce services to expand their market reach and customer base.

articles.title: New Hero Destini 110 launched at Rs 72,000
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Hero MotoCorp launched its new product, the Hero Destini, at a price of Rs. (Price not complete in given data).

articles.title: This Amazon deal makes Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 cheaper by Rs 65,000
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal that reduces the price of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold by a significant amount. This promotion makes the device more accessible to consumers.

articles.title: AGM G3 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: AGM announced the AGM G3 smartphone in Q3 2025. The AGM G3 features a 6.72-inch display, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300X processor, 12GB RAM, 512GB storage, and runs on Android 15. The device sports a 64MP + 2MP dual-camera setup and a 50MP front camera, and is powered by a 10000 mAh battery with 33W wired and 18W wireless charging.

articles.title: Is the Tecno Spark 10 Pro Still a Good Buy in 2025?
articles.summary: Tecno's Spark 10 Pro, launched in 2023, features a 6.8-inch Full HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate, up to 8GB of RAM with Memory Fusion, and a 50MP main camera. As of 2025, it sells for 314,000 at Spop Nigeria and offers a 32MP selfie camera and a 5,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Ice cream bar maker JonnyPops sticks to a winning formula
articles.author: James Carper
articles.summary: JonnyPops, led by Erik Brust and Connor Wray, develops and sells ice cream stick novelties using recognizable ingredients and a social mission. The company focuses on taste, natural ingredients, and engagement with consumers, positioning their product as a premium offering in the natural foods category with a suggested retail price of $4.79 to $4.99 for a three-count box.

articles.title: Alliance Laundry Systems Highlights Laundromats as the Next Big Investment Opportunity
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Alliance Laundry Systems highlights its laundromat solutions as a lucrative investment opportunity, showcasing its portfolio of brands, including Speed Queen, Huebsch, Primus, and IPSO. These brands offer high-efficiency washers and dryers with smart systems, focusing on durability, energy savings, and user-friendly operation for commercial laundry businesses.

articles.title: I'm a fashion editor and these are my top picks from the new M&S autumn collection
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) is launching a new season range of products.

articles.title: SeedlingLabs Revolutionizes Product Development with AI-Native PDaaS Launch
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: SeedlingLabs launched as an AI-native Product Development-as-a-Service firm. The company supports startups and product-led enterprises in scaling AI applications. SeedlingLabs also plans to open delivery centers, starting with one in Gangavathi, to hire engineers.

articles.title: Appier Announces Full Product Line Infused with Agentic AI, Ushering in a New Era of ROI Driven Marketing Solutions
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Appier, an AI native software company, launched eight purpose-built AI Agents to enhance its product portfolio. These agents are designed to assist advertisers and marketers in achieving predictable ROI by coordinating end-to-end actions throughout the customer journey.

articles.title: Appier Announces Full Product Line Infused with Agentic AI, Ushering in a New Era of ROI Driven Marketing Solutions
articles.summary: Appier has announced a new product line that is infused with Agentic AI. This launch is intended to usher in a new era of ROI-driven marketing solutions.

articles.title: SeedlingLabs, an AI-Native Product Development-as-a-Service (PDaaS) Platform, Democratizes the AI-Driven Future of Software Development
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SeedlingLabs has launched as an AI-native Product Development-as-a-Service (PDaaS) company, providing an innovative platform and services aimed at helping startups and product-led enterprises scale AI applications. The company's platform is designed to manage the entire product lifecycle. SeedlingLabs provides delivery centers in emerging talent hubs to provide talent with opportunities to work on global products.

articles.title: Fynd's Dharmendra Mehta is focused on boosting GCC retail with AI
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Fynd provides an AI-powered commerce platform, offering 15 distinct products that retailers can use individually or as a comprehensive tech stack. The platform enables AI-driven design, manufacturing, and marketing, shortening the fashion lifecycle to three months. Hugo Boss has already launched their website built on the Fynd platform.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap Coanda 2x, Reviewed: Is This $1000 Tool Worth Its Price Tag?
articles.author: Ashleigh Cometti
articles.summary: Dyson is introducing the new Airwrap Coanda 2x. It features new technology. The article contains a review of the new product.

articles.title: PTT Oil and Retail Business Unlocks Growth With AI-Driven Personalization Strategy
org: PTT Oil and Retail Business Public Company Limited
articles.summary: PTT Oil and Retail Business Public Company Limited (OR) is focusing on personalization and intelligent customer engagement by relaunching the blueplus+ app. The app relaunch attracted over 3 million video views within three days, with new brand mascots tailored to different generations.

articles.title: Clear Owl: Revolutionizing Content Marketing with AI-Human Collaboration
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Clearly Blue Digital launched Clear Owl, a platform integrating AI content creation with human oversight. This platform aims to streamline content production with a 'Generate-Review-Publish' workflow. ClearOwl.ai is available after a beta phase and includes a one-month free trial.

articles.title: Amazon Australia launches new shopping HAUL - with millions of items for less than $25
articles.author: TAHLIA PRITCHARD
articles.summary: Amazon Australia has launched 'Amazon Haul,' a new shopping experience offering millions of products across various categories for under $25. Customers can access these bargains through the Amazon Shopping app, with potential savings and free delivery options available. The initiative aims to provide value and convenience to Australian shoppers.

articles.title: Xiaomi launches new series
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its Mi 10T series smartphones in Nigeria. The series includes the flagship Mi 10T Pro and aims to provide top-notch 5G experiences for professionals, streaming enthusiasts, and mobile gamers.

articles.title: Best laundry detergents that clean up the competition
articles.summary: CHOICE tested 50 laundry detergents, revealing Omo as a top performer, with Omo powder achieving 81% rating for front loaders. ALDI's Trimat Advanced Laundry Powder Concentrate also performed well, costing 52 cents per wash. However, ALDI's Green Action Laundry Liquid Concentrate was in the loser category with 45% rating.

articles.title: Decoding the Design, Colors, and Launch Date of the Latest Trendsetter Product
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching its Xiaomi 17 smartphone series on September 25, 2025, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The series includes standard, Pro, and Pro Max models with design updates and varying color options. The standard Xiaomi 17 will be available in White and Sky Blue and boasts a 6.3-inch flat display, while the Pro and Pro Max versions feature larger screens and unique color options like 'Cold Smoke Purple' and 'Forest Green,' respectively.

articles.title: No7 launches Christmas gift sets featuring serum shoppers say 'transformed their skin'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: No7 has launched new Christmas gift sets, including the No7 Future Renew Regime Set, 7 Steps to Beautiful Skin Gift Set, and No7 Retinol Sleep Collection. These sets feature best-selling skincare products like the Future Renew Serum, Protect and Perfect Intense ADVANCED Day Cream, and Retinol Sleep Collection, designed to reverse signs of skin damage, hydrate the skin, and target wrinkles respectively.

articles.title: Hangyo's kunda-inspired ice cream flavour this Dasara
articles.author: Express News Service
articles.summary: Hangyo Ice Cream launched a new ice cream flavor inspired by Belagavi's traditional sweet, kunda, this Dasara. This seasonal offering is exclusive to Kamat BugleRock outlets and introduced through a collaboration between Kamat BugleRock and Hangyo Ice Cream.

articles.title: BAT Rothmans launches trial campaign for glo Hyper series
articles.author: Ko Dong-Hwan
articles.summary: BAT Rothmans is expanding consumer access to its glo Hyper heated tobacco devices with a new trial marketing campaign, lowering the entry barrier for first-time buyers by offering the glo Hyper pro for 29,000 won ($20) and the glo Hyper for 20,000 won. Additionally, BAT Rothmans has renewed all 10 neo consumables by adding StickSeal technology, which seals the tip of each stick to prevent residue from entering the device.

articles.title: McDonald's Australia makes major shift to take on rival KFC
articles.author: Marni Dixit
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching an upgraded McCrispy range on September 24, featuring crispier Aussie chicken, a new signature sauce, and a soft glazed bun. The new range includes the McCrispy and McCrispy Deluxe, with the Deluxe version offering Aussie Jack cheese and tomato for an additional cost. McDonald's aims to provide a 'crunchier, juicier, most mouthwatering fried chicken burger' to compete in the fast-food market.

articles.title: Mintel Most Innovative 2026: Recognizing the CPG Products Redefining the Future
articles.summary: Mintel Most Innovative awards recognize groundbreaking CPG brands. Häagen-Dazs was a previous winner for their Vanilla Bean Cultured Crème, and Izzy's Zero Waste Dew-Bomb Glowy Hydra Milk was also recognized. Submissions are now open for the 2026 awards in Beauty and Personal Care, Household, and Food and Drink categories.

articles.title: Hello Shred Expands Services with Mobile Bin Pickup and Secure Shredding in Sydney
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Hello Shred has launched a flexible mobile shredding service across Sydney. The service aims to provide secure document disposal that is quicker, simpler, and hassle-free.

articles.title: Navigating Legal Boundaries: Effective Content Writing Without Overstepping Roles
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new feature for its Google Business Profile that allows retail businesses to upload product data. This integration will enable customers to see product availability in local search results and potentially check in-store stock levels. The feature aims to increase online presence and drive foot traffic for local businesses.

articles.title: Smarter living starts here: Achieve your dream home with LG Subscribe
articles.author: Brand Studio
articles.summary: LG has launched "LG Subscribe", a subscription service allowing customers to lease appliances on flexible monthly plans. This service provides access to the latest technology and features without the upfront cost, including servicing and maintenance. In September, LG Subscribe offers added perks such as bonus months, a RedMart+ membership, and a chance to win K-pop concert tickets.

articles.title: GEEKOM Celebrates 22 Years of Excellence: "Mini PC, That's GEEKOM"
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: GEEKOM, a compact computing company, is celebrating its 22nd anniversary with discounts of up to 50% on select mini PC models from September 22 to October 25. The company emphasizes quality, reliability, and innovation in its mini PC offerings, including models like the GEEKOM A9 Mega. They consistently deliver innovations like AI-enhanced computing and silent cooling systems.

articles.title: GEEKOM Celebrates 22 Years of Excellence: "Mini PC, That's GEEKOM"
articles.summary: GEEKOM, a mini PC company, is celebrating its 22nd anniversary by offering discounts up to 50% on select mini PC models from September 22 to October 25. The company emphasizes its commitment to quality, reliability, innovation, and customer service in delivering compact computing solutions.

articles.title: 9-Year-Old's Idea Transforms into Global Tech Company Pumpify©, Teaching Next Generation Real Entrepreneurship
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Pumpify©, a family-driven global tech lifestyle company, specializes in innovative portable tech solutions for diverse customer segments. The company serves customers worldwide with convenient products that enhance daily routines and adventures. Pumpify's product portfolio caters to families, travelers, car owners, cyclists, and gamers seeking reliable technology.

articles.title: Tumbledry launches its newest franchise store in Jammu
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Tumbledry, a premium laundry and dry-cleaning brand, has launched a new franchise store in Jammu. The new outlet is equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and imported skin-friendly chemicals, promising meticulous garment care and hygiene. The store will operate seven days a week.

articles.title: A 25-year-old from Queens dropped out of school, sold his sneaker collection and opened his own laundromat. Here's how you can follow his playbook
articles.author: Danielle Antosz
articles.summary: Brandon Hollingsworth launched Don's Laundry on Hollis Avenue in Queens Village after dropping out of college and developing a detailed business plan. He even sold his sneaker collection to fund the lawyer for the deal. The laundromat aims to provide excellent customer service and cater to the community's needs.

articles.title: 'Art of Arrival': Atkins Kroll unveils 2026 Lexus NX350
articles.author: Guam Pacific Daily News
articles.summary: Atkins Kroll Inc. Guam hosted an exclusive event, "The Art of Arrival," on September 12, 2025, to unveil the all-new 2026 Lexus NX350.

articles.title: Car Washing Service Market to Reach $36.93 Billion by 2029 with 4.6% CAGR
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Warrenton Oil Company introduced a subscription service for app-based car and truck washing in June 2023. This program offers a convenient and touch-free solution for clients and generates a stable income source for the company. Customers can choose from vehicle wash membership options via the Fastlane application.

articles.title: 'TRON: Ares' lights up New York City for TRON Day
articles.author: ABC7
articles.summary: Disney celebrated TRON Day by launching a new product.

articles.title: भैंसेपाटीमा सामसङको सोरुम
articles.author: कान्तिपुर संवाददाता
articles.summary: Samsung has opened a new showroom in Bhainsepati with the aim of providing authentic Samsung products such as smartphones, televisions, home appliances and other electronics to customers in and around the area. The new showroom offers special offers, a modern shopping environment, and expert guidance from trained staff.

articles.title: StartupScene & Madinet Masr Present
articles.summary: Beauty brand Zat has experienced significant growth after Alaa Mahfouz's appearance on Shark Tank, catching the attention of investor Abdullah Sallam. Zat's philosophy centers on celebrating 'real' beauty with natural, science-backed skincare, and it encourages customers to discover their perfect formulations and identities. The company has progressed significantly since its appearance on 'Shark Tank'.

articles.title: Herbalife launches global product innovation center in Shanghai
articles.author: Zhou Wenting
articles.summary: Herbalife unveiled its upgraded Global Product Innovation Center in Shanghai, expanding its R&D capabilities to support Asia and other global regions. This upgrade signifies Herbalife's recognition of China's market potential and aims to leverage China's cultural heritage for unique product innovation.

articles.title: Robotin to Redefine Home Cleaning with R2, The World's First Robot Carpet Cleaner
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Robotin INC has announced the global launch of the Robotin R2 on Kickstarter starting September 23. The Robotin R2 is the world's first 2-in-1 modular carpet cleaning system and a sophisticated carpet washing system.

articles.title: ChatGPT's 'compute-intensive' next act better be dazzling, because the competition is outshining its recent efforts
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: OpenAI is planning to release new premium features for its ChatGPT service. The company aims to maintain relevance amidst competition by providing features exceeding vague promises.
